Content:
[dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> ```
@dukeleto it has to be CLI. here is a guide that PIRATE community uses for z_mergetoaddress. probably, BTCH users can use that too, just need to use ./komodo-cli -ac_name=BTCH instead of ./pirate https://github.com/PirateNetwork/docs/wiki/Use-z_mergetoaddress-to-migrate-your-funds-from-sprout-address-to-sapling-address
or use zmigrate dApp https://github.com/PirateNetwork/docs/wiki/Using-zmigrate-dApp-to-Migrate-Funds-from-Sprout-to-Sapling-Automatically
same, just use ./zmigrate PIRATE zsxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
```
